---

config:
    theme: 'base'
    themeVariables:
        primaryColor: '#1f2020'
        primaryTextColor: '#f0f0f0'
        background: '#333'
        primaryBorderColor: '#888888'
        lineColor: '#999'

---

stateDiagram

state ORDER_MENU {

        state BEVERAGE {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as BEVERAGE.(InitialState)

                BEVERAGE__FIRST

                BEVERAGE__FIRST : BEVERAGE__FIRST

                COFFEE

                COFFEE : COFFEE

                COFFEE : enter / #123; do_x()#59; #125;

                TEA

                TEA : TEA

                state "$HC" as BEVERAGE.(HistoryContinue)

        }

        state FOOD {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as FOOD.(InitialState)

                FOOD__FIRST

                FOOD__FIRST : FOOD__FIRST

                POTATO

                POTATO : POTATO

                SUSHI

                SUSHI : SUSHI

        }

        state "$entry_pt.to_history" as ORDER_MENU.(EntryPoint)(to_history)

        state "$exit_pt.1" as ORDER_MENU.(ExitPoint)(1)

        state "$H" as ORDER_MENU.(History)

        state ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(bev_choice) <>

}

WAITING

WAITING : WAITING

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

ORDER_MENU --> WAITING : EV3

BEVERAGE --> FOOD : EV2

BEVERAGE.(InitialState) --> BEVERAGE__FIRST

BEVERAGE__FIRST --> COFFEE : EV1

COFFEE --> TEA : EV1

TEA --> COFFEE : EV1

TEA --> BEVERAGE.(InitialState) : EV2

FOOD --> ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(bev_choice) : EV2

FOOD --> ORDER_MENU.(ExitPoint)(1) : ESCAPE

FOOD.(InitialState) --> FOOD__FIRST

FOOD__FIRST --> POTATO : EV1

POTATO --> SUSHI : EV1

SUSHI --> FOOD__FIRST : EV1

ORDER_MENU.(EntryPoint)(to_history) --> ORDER_MENU.(History)

ORDER_MENU.(ExitPoint)(1) --> WAITING

ORDER_MENU.(History) --> BEVERAGE

ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(bev_choice) --> TEA : [a > b]

ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(bev_choice) --> BEVERAGE : else

WAITING --> ORDER_MENU.(EntryPoint)(to_history) : EV3

ROOT.(InitialState) --> WAITING
Events
settings delete help
